metadata.title: CVE-2019-12418 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
When Apache Tomcat 9.0.0.M1 to 9.0.28, 8.5.0 to 8.5.47, 7.0.0 and 7.0.97 is configured with the JMX Remote Lifecycle Listener, a local attacker without access to the Tomcat process or configuration files is able to manipulate the RMI registry to perform a man-in-the-middle attack to capture user names and passwords used to access the JMX interface. The attacker can then use these credentials to access the JMX interface and gain complete control over the Tomcat instance.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-12418` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtomcat9-embed-java - 9.0.31-1
libtomcat9-java - 9.0.31-1
tomcat9 - 9.0.31-1
tomcat9-admin - 9.0.31-1
tomcat9-common - 9.0.31-1
tomcat9-examples - 9.0.31-1
tomcat9-user - 9.0.31-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tomcat9 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.0.31-1').
